There is a alternative design to the EIP-7685. The draft of the proposal is outlined in the Engine API PR with additional discussion points in the description: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/551

It would be great if CL and EL devs could take a look before the ACDC call this week where i'd like to raise this proposal for discussion (https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1050#issuecomment-2135781938)
